ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory

Class BrowsableInventories

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.inventory.BrowsableInventories
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filterable<Item>, Observable, Observer

    public class BrowsableInventories
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filterable<Item>, Observer, Observable
    Model maintains a List of all of the user's friends and a list of all friends inventory items. Will notify the observing user and any others registered as observers of any change. Used by browsable Views. Also available to anything requiring a list of all tradable items.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BrowsableInventories()
      Constructs the model by fetching current users friends.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BrowsableInventories

        public BrowsableInventories()
        Constructs the model by fetching current users friends. Must be follow by getBrowsables() to further fetch the friends inventory items.

        public java.lang.Thread getBrowsables()
        Returns thread that can be used to generate updated list of user's friends items async. Used to update the model in efforts of fetching all friends items.
